name: library-management-system--backend-
description: Library Management SystemAPI Description The Library Management SystemAPI is a backendsystemdesignedtofacilitate the management of a library's resources and services through web-based applications. It provides a set of endpoints that allowusers to performvarious operations related to managing books, users, and borrowing/returning books. This project will allowyou to apply the skills you've learned throughout the bootcamptoadifferent domain.
author: StarmannRassy & Dearie-de-Cybek
